meta.title: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.description: Join Pull-Up Club at Battle Bunker, the ultimate online pull-up competition. Submit your videos, get rated, and top the global leaderboard to earn badges and prizes.
meta.ogTitle: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.ogDescription: Compete with athletes from around the world in the ultimate test of strength. Can you top the leaderboard?

hero.title: Welcome to Pull-Up Club
hero.subtitle: One Submission a Month. $1 Per Rep. Your First Month is Free!
hero.pullUpsToday: <0>{{count}}</0> pull-ups completed in the last 24 hours

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Join the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Challenge in three simple steps. Train for your first pull-up or push your limits - compete and connect with athletes worldwide.

step1.title: Record & Submit
step1.description: Record your best pull-up performance, post it publicly and submit the video link along with a fee.

step2.title: Get Reviewed
step2.description: Our team will review your submission for proper form and count your pull-ups.

step3.title: Join the Leaderboard
step3.description: Once verified, your performance will be featured on our global leaderboard.
